problem_text_cn: 如图．已知AB为⊙O的直径,AB=2,AD和BE是⊙O的两条切线,A、B为切点,过圆上一点C作⊙O的切线CF,分别交AD、BE于点M、N,连接AC、CB．若∠ABC=30°,则AM的长是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure. Knowing that AB is the diameter of ⊙O, AB = N_0, AD and BE are the two tangents of ⊙O, A and B are the tangent points, and cross a point C on the circle as the tangent CF of ⊙O, and intersect AD and BE at points respectively. M, N, connect AC, CB. If ∠ABC = N_1, then the length of AM is ()
raw_answer: 解:连接OM,OC,∵OB=OC,且∠ABC=30°,∴∠BCO=∠ABC=30°,∵∠AOC为△BOC的外角,∴∠AOC=2∠ABC=60°,∵MA,MC分别为圆O的切线,∴MA=MC,且∠MAO=∠MCO=90°,在Rt△AOM和Rt△COM中,\begin{cases}MA=MC\\OM=OM\end{cases},∴Rt△AOM≌Rt△COM(HL),∴∠AOM=∠COM=\frac{1}{2}∠AOC=30°,在Rt△AOM中,OA=\frac{1}{2}AB=1,∠AOM=30°,∴tan30°=\frac{AM}{OA},即\frac{√{3}}{3}=\frac{AM}{1},解得:AM=\frac{√{3}}{3}．故选:A．
